reviewText:
I love this because of its strong intellectual and emotional content. Era appropriate music was also good.
Bought this from Hong Kong in 2000. I am impressed with its unusual story telling when the story is interrupted by her 'metaphysical' discussion about the story.
Ms. Chang's exploration of close friendship between two women is introduced again in this DVD, this time with K. Mok as a lesbian. The close friendship between women reappear in "20 30 40." Note that Ms. Chang began her showbiz career as a pop singer.
I still have the DVD and a mkv'd backup.
Great movie! its great to see that NOT ALL MOVIES have to have a happy ending to be great!

This story is one that will keep your interest as it plays out how life can twist and turn, and sometimes can only be understood by looking back over a lifetime, when little twists in the story can have huge impact on quality of life and happiness.
